sentences.sContent: I covered the elk with a tarp and sat down near it, wrapping myself in blankets.
sentences.sContent_eng: I covered the elk with a tarp and sat down near it, wrapping myself in blankets.
sentences.sCn: 我用一块防水布盖住了麋鹿，然后用毯子把自己裹起来，坐在它旁边。

sentences.sContent: When the elk got up, the tarp slid off.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the elk got up, the tarp slid off.
sentences.sCn: 麋鹿站起来的时候，防水布从它身上滑落。

synos.tran: 麋鹿；软鞣粗皮；驼鹿皮革

trans.tranOther: a very large brown North American, European, and Asian animal with wide flat horns
